en.content: You lunge for a handhold. Your fingers scrabble against the wall. In a second you are dropping, dropping hard to the stony ground—

text.content: Take 2D6 damage as you hit the ground. If this is equal to or greater than half of your full hit points, you have taken a major wound.

zh.content: 你弓身向上扑，寻找支撑点，手指在墙壁上乱抓。还没有一秒种的工夫，你再次下坠，结结实实地摔到了岩石地面上——

text.content: 你撞上地面时受到 2D6 点伤害。如果这次伤害的数值大于等于你最大耐久值的一半，你就受到了重伤。

text.en: You have taken a major wound, continue
You have not taken a major wound, continue
